item.description:
Tis that time of year, when the powder on the mountain is plentiful, soft, and majestic. This is a locals place that I found by accident while on a random trip to NH. I wanted to go and figured that some of you heathens may want to hit the slopes. Have no fear if you have no gear (read below). I will be driving up and will have room for 3 people in my car, if there is enough interest I will rent a van.


POP...Under the Lights.... SATURDAY NIGHTS!

POP....PAY-ONE-PRICE...ONLY $39
Includes...Skiing...Snowboarding...Snowtubing...Rentals...
Lesson Tips...Entertainment

Ski or Ride on a Saturday Night from 3 pm to 10 pm for only $39.
Saturday Night POP runs December 26, 2009 through End of Season 2010.
Tubing hours are from 5 pm to 10 pm. (There will be NO tubing on Sat, March 20 & 27)
Lesson Tips are from 4 pm to 6 pm in the Beginners Area.

Step Up To "POP" Tickets:
Ticket Valid: 3pm - 10pm $39


Please Note: The POP ticket is the only lift ticket available on Saturday nights. Rentals available on a first-come, first-served basis. Child (5 & under) $20 for rentals during POP.

POP Group Discounts for 15 or more people
Advanced Reservations required. Contact Group Sales in advance at 1-888-PATS PEAK, ext. 106.

The most affordable night skiing in all of New England!

Diversity Day Goes POP on Martin Luther King, Jr. Day from 3pm to 9pm:
Includes skiing, snowboarding, snowtubing, rentals and lesson tips from 3pm to 9pm for just $39. (Lesson Tips 4pm to 6pm in the Beginners Area. Snowtubing 5pm to 9pm.) Special Diversity Day Goes POP discounts for groups of 15 or more people. Check out our Group Diversity Day Goes POP page for more details. The POP ticket is the only lift ticket available for Diversity Day Goes POP for all ages. Rentals available on a first-come, first-served basis.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in front the rental hall.
item.name: Snowboarding/Skiing
